column3: Rapha does excellent videos. What was the music in this one?
Hello Rapha ! Would be nice to come here in Bucharest ! The cycling community has grown up really fast in the last couple of years. Send me a message if you're planning to do a visit !
Come in Val di Fiemme, Trentino!
You went to 19 cities and this is honestly the sum total of what you found?
I'd love to ride with someone! I'm from Rome!
